synopsis.text:
Japanese animated film "BanG Dream! FILM LIVE 2nd Stage" brings back beloved bands 'Poppin'Party', 'Afterglow', 'Pastelâœ½Palettes', 'Roselia', and 'Hello, Happy World!' for another unforgettable performance. This time, they're joined by two new bands: 'Morfonica', a symphonic band with a captivating worldview, and 'RAISE A SUILEN', a rock band that confidently claims to be the best. As these seven bands take the stage for the '2nd Stage', what new heights will they strive to reach?

As the sequel to BanG Dream! FILM LIVE, this second animated live movie for the BanG Dream! franchise was announced on March 16, 2020. It premiered in Japanese theaters on August 20, 2021, following a pre-screening in five selected theaters across the country on August 10, 2021. The film also premiered in the United States and Canada through Eventive on September 18, 2021. Prepare for an exhilarating musical journey that promises to deliver the best concert experience once again!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
